column2: good eats.  We enjoy the beef and chicken fajita combo
column3: and here's a tip:  order the queso plus a quarter pound of chopped brisket on the side.  Now with a little fine dining magic - dump the beef right into that hot cheese for your table to enjoy. Give advance notice to your server for more chips
column4: they'll go quickly with this flavor boost.  Get the house margarita
column5: large size.  It will be plenty although it will try to order another for you all by itself.  Don't yield to temptation if you're driving....but if you're not
